title: Building reduce to ashes as fire engulfs in Karachi
content:
Karachi, Feb 26 (APP):A massive fire broke out in a rickshaw at the Ramswami police headquarter here on Monday.
According to a private news channel, the police said that the rickshaw carried a petrol huge tank to sell the fire erupted in the rickshaw and spread and engulfed the entire residential building very quickly.
The tailorâ€™s shop under the building burnt completely. Three sides of the building were damaged and luckily no casualties were reported.
Two petrol pumps employees have been arrested and shifted to a police station.
